Name: Caipiruva Bacchanalia
Instructions: MUDDLE lime and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.
Review: This twist on Dale's Caipiruva is sweetened by honey and dessert wine.
History: Created in 2008 by Julian de Féral at The East Rooms, London, England.
